participant_1.background:
I'm a couch potato who loves Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors.
My sunflowers are a source of pride for me, but my family's income comes from my job as a farmer.
i work in the pharmaceutical industry.
I don't talk to my family anymore.
I like a soft bed for my baby.

participant_2.background:
I'm doing my best to maintain a healthy weight.
I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike.
I am not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I would hope they would be supportive.
I am a busy student who walks for exercise to de-stress after my kids go to bed.
I check in with my pup.

content.text: Hello! What are you up to?
Hey there! I am just checking in with my pup, he is a little lonely today.
Aww, that's too bad! What kind of pup do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Bailey.
Oh, golden retrievers are so cute! Do you take him for walks a lot?
Yeah, I try to take him for walks at least once a day.
That's great! I used to have a golden retriever, but I had to give him up when I moved.
Oh, that's too bad. I'm sorry to hear that.
Yeah, it was tough. But I'm glad that he's in a good home now.
That's what matters most.
Yeah, exactly. So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch a lot of TV, and I also like to play video games.
Oh, what kind of TV shows do you like to watch?
I like to watch a lot of reality TV, and I also like to watch some drama and comedy shows.
Me too! I love reality TV. What's your favorite show?
I really like watching 90 Day Fiancé.
Oh, I've heard of that show! I've never seen it before, but it sounds interesting.
It's a really good show! It's about people from different countries who are trying to get married to Americans.
Oh, that sounds like a lot of drama!
It is! It's really funny, but it's also really dramatic.
I'm going to have to check it out!
You should! I think you'd like it.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem
